abilities.name: Bust In
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may move any number of basic Energy attached to your Pokémon to this Pokémon. If you do, switch this Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jet Sonic
attacks.effect: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage.
